The shaman can touch a willing creature (including herself ) and grants a ward of wind. This ward lasts for a number of rounds equal to the shamanâ€™s level. When a warded creature is attacked with an arrow, ray, or other ranged attack that requires an attack roll, that attack suffers a 20% miss chance.

At 8th level, the ward lasts for 1 minute for every level the shaman possesses.

At 16th level, the miss chance increases to 50%.

Once affected, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
